wordpressPost.title: Foals will play Øya’s Saturday
wordpressPost.content:
Foals are ready to tour all over the world, after the success of the new album What Went Down. They are an extraordinary live band, something they will prove on several continents in 2016. On Saturday 13th of August they will play Øya.

Foals from Oxford have released four albums in their ten year history. They are considered to be one of Britain’s best live bands and won an award for this in Q Magazine in 2013. The same magazine gave them the award for being the best band in the world in 2015. All their albums have been in the top ten in the UK charts, and their success in Europe is ever increasing. In their songs, you can hear traces of catchy pop, post-rock, danceable rhythms and energetic indie, combined with members’ background in so-called math rock.

 

www.foals.co.uk

photo Niel Krug

messages.404.title: Hmm, den siden fant vi ikke (404)
messages.errorboundary.desc: Vi setter utrolig stor pris på om du vil hjelpe oss med å rapportere feilen, slik at vi kan få fikset den så fort som mulig. Tusen takk!

messages.newsletter.consentText: Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding om at den ikke er aktiv.
